metadata.name: DLL Execution Via Register-cimprovider.exe
metadata.comment: Detects using register-cimprovider.exe to execute arbitrary dll file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\register-cimprovider.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-path')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dll')))

output.summary: Detects using register-cimprovider.exe to execute arbitrary dll file.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://twitter.com/PhilipTsukerman/status/992021361106268161, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Register-cimprovider/
